discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
CND Book P.368

questions.question_text: John wants to implement a packet filtering firewall in his organization's network. What TCP/IP layer does a packet filtering firewall work on?
Andrew would like to configure IPsec in a manner that provides confidentiality for the content of packets. What component of IPsec provides this capability?

discussion.content: Encapsulating Security Payloads (ESP) provides confidentiality, connectionless data integrity, data-origin authentication, an anti-replay service (a form of partial sequence integrity), and limited traffic-flow confidentiality.

questions.question_text: A newly joined network administrator wants to assess the organization against possible risk. He notices the organization doesn't have a __________ identified which helps measure how risky an activity is.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer is D, CND Book P.2207

the answer is D: 
according to ECCcouncil stud material 

A key risk indicator (KRI) is an important component of an effective risk management process that shows the riskiness of an activity
A risk matrix is used to scale risk by considering the probability, likelihood, and consequence/impact of the risk Probability

choices.C: Notifies when risk has reached threshold levels

discussion.content:
Identifying the adverse effect of an event
Notifying on threshold levels of the risk
Backward looking view on risk events

Coul be B the correct Answer.
KRI does not notify nor Identifies Adverse Events but Event Impact

Answer is C according to ECCcouncil CND study material 

Role of KRIs  Identify current risk exposure and emerging risk trends in order to provide an early warning and proactive action
 Event impact identification  Threshold level notifications  Backward looking view on risk events, enabling learning lessons from the past events  Highlight weaknesses of the existing controls and allow strengthening of poor controls  Facilitate the risk-reporting and escalation process  Provide an indication that the risk appetite and tolerance are reached  Provide real-time actionable intelligence to decision-makers and risk managers

Selected Answer: A
Answer is A as KRI doesnt not notify

questions.question_text: Chris is a senior network administrator. Chris wants to measure the Key Risk Indicator (KRI) to assess the organization. Why is Chris calculating the KRI for his organization? It helps Chris to:

Which Event Correlation Approach checks and compares all the fields systematically and intentionally for positive and negative correlation with each other to determine the correlation across one or multiple fields?

discussion.content:
Automated Field Correlation
This method checks and compares all the fields systematically and intentionally for positive and negative correlation with each other to determine the correlation across one or multiple fields.
